required.name: Bhutan
required.note: If a visa clearance is obtained, it can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Cameroon
required.note: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: China
required.note:
Visa not required for 30 days for travelling as part of an accredited tour group.
72-hours visa free visit when in transit at Beijing, Changsha, Chengdu, Chongqing, Dalian, Guangzhou, Guilin, Harbin, Kunming, Qingdao, Shenyang, Tianjin, Wuhan, Xi'an and Xiamen.
144-hours visa free visit when in transit at Hangzhou, Nanjing and Shanghai's airports, Railway Station and port.
May visit Suifenhe without a visa for up to 15 days if travelling with at least one companion.
Residents of Amur Oblast may visit Heihe without a visa for a day.

required.name: Croatia
required.note: No visa required for holders of valid Bulgaria, Romania, Cyprus and Schengen visas.

required.name: Cyprus
required.note: Pro-Visa issued online free of charge valid for 90 per 180 days in a year.

required.name: Eritrea
required.note: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Ghana
required.note: Pre-arranged emergency visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Greece
required.note: Visa-free access to Chios, Kastellorizo, Kos, Lesvos, Rhodes, Samos and Symi during the summer when arriving on ferries from adjacent Turkish ports.

required.name: Republic of Ireland
required.note: Visa waiver for UK 'C' visa holders until October 2016. Entry permitted only if first point of entry to the Common Travel Area is in the UK.

required.name: Kuwait
required.note: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Latvia
required.note: 90 days within 6 month for holders of border traffic permit.

required.name: Liberia
required.note: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Libya
required.note: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Mozambique
required.note: Visa on arrival is no longer available to citizens of countries that host an embassy of Mozambique.

required.name: Nigeria
required.note: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Norway
required.note: 15 days for holders of border traffic permit.

required.name: Pakistan
required.note: Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply.

required.name: Poland
required.note: 30 days for residents of Kaliningrad Oblast with border traffic permit. (temporarily suspended)

required.name: Qatar
required.note: Visa on arrival to be introduced in October 2016

required.name: Sierra Leone
required.note: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Solomon Islands
required.note: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Sudan
required.note: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Syria
required.note: According to the IATA database, visa may be obtained on arrival and is valid for 15 days. According to the media, Syria passed a new law that requires all foreign citizens to obtain a visa in advance.

required.name: Turkmenistan
required.note: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: United Arab Emirates
required.note: 96-hour transit visa fee on arrival by plane

required.name: United Kingdom
required.note: 24-hours visa-free visit: 1) when in transit to/from Australia, Canada, New Zealand or USA, or 2) if holder of residence permit issued by Australia, Canada, New Zealand or USA, or 3) if holder of certain EEA or Switzerland visas, or 4) if holder of certain Irish visas

not-required.name: Albania
not-required.note: 90 days. Temporary visa exemption from 15 May to 1 November 2016.

not-required.name: Belarus
not-required.note: Freedom of movement. Use of internal passport allowed.

not-required.name: Dominican Republic
not-required.note: 90 days (10 USD Tourist Card valid for 30 days must be purchased upon arrival)

not-required.name: Kazakhstan
not-required.note: 90 days, use of internal passport allowed

not-required.name: South Korea
not-required.note: 60 days, visa not required for 90 days for Jeju Island.

not-required.name: Republic of Macedonia
not-required.note: 90 days within 6 month. Without a voucher and an invitation/letter of guarantee until 15 March 2017.

not-required.name: Serbia
not-required.note: 30 days; 90 days for valid Schengen or US visa holders and residents

not-required.name: Ukraine
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days. Internal passports are not accepted for border crossing.

not-required.name: Vietnam
not-required.note: 15 days; 30 day visa free on Phú Quốc

evisa.name: Ivory Coast
evisa.note: 3 months; eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

evisa.name: India
evisa.note: 30 days; eTV holders must arrive via 16 designated airports.

evisa.name: Kenya
evisa.note: 3 months. Can also be entered on an East Africa Tourist Visa issued by Rwanda or Uganda.

evisa.name: Mexico
evisa.note:
180 days. Electronic permit gives the right to enter the country only by air.
No Electronic Authorization System required for holders of valid US visa.

evisa.name: Myanmar
evisa.note: 28 days. eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports or via land border crossings with Thailand — Tachileik, Myawaddy and Kawthaung.

evisa.name: Rwanda
evisa.note: 90 days. Can also be entered on an East Africa Tourist Visa issued by Kenya or Uganda.

evisa.name: São Tomé and Príncipe
evisa.note: Holders of a visa issued by the United States or a Schengen area member state do not require a visa for stays up to 15 days.

evisa.name: Singapore
evisa.note: Some provisions for 96 hours visa-free transit.

on-arrival.name: Egypt
on-arrival.note: Visa not required for tourists arriving at Sharm El Sheik (SSH), Saint Catherine (SKV) or Taba (TCP) airports and remaining in the Sinai resorts for a maximum stay of 15 days.

on-arrival.name: Lebanon
on-arrival.note: 1 month extendable for 2 additional months; granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or seal, holding a telephone number, an address in Lebanon, and a non refundable return or circle trip ticket.

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note:
30 days, provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: Uganda
on-arrival.note:
May apply online.
Can also be entered on an East Africa Tourist Visa issued by Kenya or Rwanda.

on-arrival.name: Zambia
on-arrival.note: 90 days; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zimbabwe; also eligible for e-Visa.

on-arrival.name: Zimbabwe
on-arrival.note: 3 months; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zambia; also eligible for e-Visa.
